channel.title: Graphics on Denis Labrecque
channel.description: Recent content in Graphics on Denis Labrecque

item.title: Scale Air Campaign
item.description: Apparel This apparel was created and branded for the Ad Design campaign of Scale Air, a model airplane show in Montreal. It is designed to be sold as a fundraiser at the event. It was first sketched out on paper, then made in Illustrator and mocked up in Photoshop. Stage Design This multipurpose stage is meant for live scale modeling demonstrations and sponsor product highlights.

item.title: Asian Garden
item.description: I created this scene to challenge myself to represent nature. It taught me how to use software light, and how to texture natural elements like water to make a good-looking render. An asset software called Bridge helped speed the composition process, and the image was rendered from Blender. This image represents a garden that is closed off and allows wading in a pond of clear water while enjoying the warm sun.
